content.raw: Will there be any new features where each individual joint on the finger can be controlled? At this rate it's nearly impossible to grasp anything with the solidity that's necessary. Especially smaller objects such as the cable and airleak tool. Currently when i try to grab the handle of the solar panel, if i attempt to close the fingers too much it goes into a curl that only closes the outer most two joints on each finger. I'm just wondering if this will be something i should work around or expect any possible modifications.
